title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.

Description: If the key field is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed correctly in the chart.
OB: When the key field is left blank while adding externalized text, the text does not appear in the chart.
EB: The system should not allow the key field to be left blank when adding externalized text. It should display the externalized text correctly in the chart.
SR:
To reproduce:

1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Attempt adding the externalized text to the chart with the key field left blank.
